articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Modi, Egypt President discuss West Asia turmoil amid Israeli offensive in Gaza - Hindustan Times
articles.description: PM Modi and President Sisi expressed shared concerns about terrorism, violence, and loss of civilian lives in the region. | Latest News India
articles.content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi spoke to Egyptian President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi on Saturday, during which they exchanged views on the deteriorating security and humanitarian situation in West Asia amid… [+2204 chars]
